sentences.english: The ampersand (&) characters between the sibling element subpatterns indicate that any order is acceptable.
sentences.chinese: 兄弟元素子範式之間的豎線表示允許任何順序。

sentences.english: Currently there are different understandings and views on "XR", the technical paradigm of circular economy.
sentences.chinese: 對循環經濟的技術範式，人們有着不同的認識和說法。

sentences.english: This has led to a more comprehensive neurobiological paradigm for the system of cognitive therapy.
sentences.chinese: 指引着認知治療系統更全面的神經生物學範式。

sentences.english: The realities of the hardware, then, are sculpted to best support that paradigm.
sentences.chinese: 於是硬件的設計就趨向對這種範式進行最好的支持。

sentences.english: Figure of equivalence of ⑼ predicative logic and toe-int model type.
sentences.chinese: ⑼謂詞邏輯等值演算與前束範式。

sentences.english: The model embodied a kind of harmony of progressiveness and appropriateness.
sentences.chinese: 這種教育範式體現了先進性與適切性的統一。

sentences.english: The THOG problem is a paradigm to study the exclusive disjunction.
sentences.chinese: THOG問題是研究不相容選言推理的一個實驗範式。

sentences.english: The conciousness subject is regarded as the basical way of the philosophy after the Midlle Age.
sentences.chinese: 意識主體是近代哲學的基本範式。

sentences.english: Open the Layer Style box and change the "Dolor Overlay" to whellote.
sentences.chinese: 打開圖層範式中，轉變“色彩疊加”爲白的色彩。

sentences.english: Chivalric novels are subject to the internal influence of traditional fictional paradigms.
sentences.chinese: 武俠小說受傳統範式的影響有其特定的規定性。

sentences.english: This thesis is located within the paradigm of SFG.
sentences.chinese: 本文是系統功能語法範式的研究。

sentences.english: Multimethod modeling is the most important feature of AnyLogic.
sentences.chinese: 它是我見到過的最強大的多範式仿真工具。

sentences.english: Recognize the value of each paradigm.
sentences.chinese: 認識到兩種範式的價值。

sentences.english: The third part studies the patterns of the value development of youth ideological-political education.
sentences.chinese: 青年思想政治教育價值發展的範式。

sentences.english: Conjectural variation is the theory base of Harvard school's SCP paradigm.
sentences.chinese: 推測變量法是哈佛學派SCP範式的理論基礎。

sentences.english: That's why we need to change the IT paradigms in place.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我們爲什麼要就地改變IT範式的原因。

definition: to take an alternate route (idiom)/to find an alternative/to take a different approach/to blaze a new trail
to flow and change/development and change (of society)
axle/(fig.) central element/key element/axis (alliance of nations)
